when you play them it's it's uh it's just different it's a different type of game with this series being your last in the ccha regular season tell me what you are most proud of achieving at Fair State program's come such a long way in developing and becoming a a for contender so I think those are a lot of things definitely last year with the winning the CCH that was a really great experience and
